character.age: 23 years old, with a youthful appearance due to her species' regenerative abilities
character.background: Kaida was born in the crystal caves of Aerthys, where she grew up learning the art of aeromancy from her mother. She left her home to explore the world and uncover the truth about her past.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Silver-white, falls to her mid-back in loose waves
